reviews.review_msg: Great prof. Really engaging and understands material well. Challenging material but still an enjoyable class.

Hands down the most knowledgeable and most engaging prof I've ever had. This man could have had a career as a stand up comic if he wanted.  The course material is SUPER difficult (it's like Kin 305 on roids) but he has a way of making it interesting.

great prof. best i have had. 412 is a lot of work, but is worth it - esp. since Tibbits is very good. It's nice having a teacher that really knows what he is talking about - too bad he didn't teach other courses anymore.

Good prof and one of the most knowledgeable out there. No text for the course so listening to the lecture tapes after class are a good idea (or all in the days leading up to the exam if you're cramming). Projects are time consuming, but you'll learn a lot. Definitely take the course if you are interested in cardiology.
